summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1132, for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from a point three hundred (300) feet north of the north line of East Fifty-second Street to East Forty-fifth Street, by constructing sewers, wyes, openings, manholes, lamp holes, flush tanks and catch basins, and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 12899 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
